sentences.en: Finally, we illustrated the expression role of body attributive semantic research.
sentences.cn: 最后说明了体词性定语的表达作用.

sentences.en: He did not want to enter into a semantic debate.
sentences.cn: 他不想卷入一场关于语义的争论。

sentences.en: It'semantic similarity between terms according to the semantic paths and information.
sentences.cn: 该算法根据GeneOntology术语之间的语义路径以及信息量,计算它们的相似程度.

sentences.en: Most of them are productive. They have grammatical, semantic and aspect function.
sentences.cn: 具有一定的语法 、 语义、语体功能.

sentences.en: Other semantic entanglements might be mentioned.
sentences.cn: 还可以举出一些语义上的其他混乱现象.

sentences.en: Polysemy, ambiguity, pun are three semantic phenomena which people always concern.
sentences.cn: 多义 、 歧义 、 双关是人们一直关注的三种语义现象.

sentences.en: Semantic relations are much more important than syntactic markers or connectors.
sentences.cn: 语义关系的重要性远远胜过句法标记和连接成分.

sentences.en: Semantic relevancy computation is used to solve structural disambiguity in parsing syntactic.
sentences.cn: 为解决句法分析中的结构性歧义,引入了语义相关度计算.

sentences.cn: 量词 “ 组 ” 和 “ 套 ” 对名词性成分的语义选择.

sentences.en: The Semantic Web would also be a bottomless trove of eureka insights.
sentences.cn: 语义万维网也会是新发现的无底宝库.

sentences.en: There are two kinds of puns, phonetic pun and semantic pun.
sentences.cn: 双关语分为谐音双关和语义双关两类.

sentences.en: This article approaches neologism from the angle of semantic extension.
sentences.cn: 从语义泛化角度探讨新词语.

sentences.en: This paper introduces semantic computation into our Chinese Question - Answering system.
sentences.cn: 该文在中文问题回答系统中引入了语义计算.

sentences.en: Today it is fashionable to use the semantic differential technique.
sentences.cn: 今天它是时兴的使用语义差别技术.

sentences.en: Usually we call this kind of ambiguous semantic structure ambiguity.
sentences.cn: 英语中的结构歧义是一种常见的歧义现象.

sentences.en: We shall often find correlation between grammatical and semantic categories.
sentences.cn: 我们往往会发现语法范畴和语义范畴之间的相互联系.
